message: nice. I watch a lot of repositories I'd rather star or something
I use watch when I think something looks promising, and I want to keep track of its development.
yeah, watching is more useful if you want track progress, otherwise it'll be mess on news feed page
Hope search by description of watched list will be on github some day
btw, anyone also using watch as bookmarks?
thanks god most repos i'm watching is not updated too often
@MasterLambaster http://twitter.com/#!/micrypt/status/29583711225778176 Using "watch" as bookmarks can really get out of hand. I ended up making a bookmark folder just for Github repos instead.
just found myself using search function for watched repos recently ...
forgot to mention that it's open source and dead simple in implementation https://github.com/MasterLambaster/HubWatch
